Charm.name: Manipulate Someone
Charm.description: When you manipulate someone, roll +Charm. On a hit, they'll do what you want if you promise them something they want.

outcomes.10+: They'll do it if you promise them something they want
outcomes.7-9: They'll do it, but only if you do what they ask right now
outcomes.6-: They won't do it, and they're probably pissed off

Cool.name: Act Under Pressure
Cool.description: When you act under pressure, roll +Cool.

outcomes.10+: You do what you set out to do
outcomes.7-9: You stumble, hesitate, or flinch: the Keeper will offer you a worse outcome, hard bargain, or ugly choice

Cool.name: Help Out
Cool.description: When you help another hunter, roll +Cool.

outcomes.7-9: They get +1 on their roll, but you expose yourself to danger, cost, or trouble

Sharp.name: Investigate a Mystery
Sharp.description: When you investigate a mystery, roll +Sharp.

outcomes.6-: Hold 1, but you reveal some information to the monster or whoever you are questioning

arrays.title: Hold Options
values: What sort of creature is it?
What was it going to do?

Sharp.name: Read a Bad Situation
Sharp.description: When you look around and read a bad situation, roll +Sharp.

outcomes.6-: The Keeper will tell you what trouble you're walking into

arrays.title: Hold Options
values: Are there any dangers we haven't noticed?
What's the best way to protect the victims?

Tough.name: Kick Some Ass
Tough.description: When you get into a fight and kick some ass, roll +Tough.

outcomes.10+: You and your allies inflict harm on (and suffer harm from) your enemies
outcomes.7-9: You inflict harm but choose whether you suffer harm, you lose your weapon, or you have to hold back (i.e., don't inflict harm)
outcomes.6-: You get your ass kicked instead

Tough.name: Protect Someone
Tough.description: When you prevent harm to another person, roll +Tough.

outcomes.10+: You protect them okay, but you'll suffer some or all of the harm they were going to get
outcomes.7-9: You protect them, but it's going to cost you: either you take all the harm, or you take little harm but also take -1 forward, or you suffer some other cost
outcomes.6-: You don't manage to protect them

Weird.name: Use Magic
Weird.description: When you use magic, say what you're trying to achieve and how you do the spell, then roll +Weird.

outcomes.10+: The magic works without issues: you do what you wanted
outcomes.7-9: The magic works, but choose one: the effect is unstable or weak, it draws unwanted attention, or it has a problematic side effect
outcomes.6-: The magic goes wrong in some terrible way

Moves.name: Take the Risk
Moves.description: When you do something risky that is not covered by another move, the Keeper will tell you what attribute to roll.

outcomes.10+: It goes off without a hitch
outcomes.7-9: It works, but with a complication or cost

ClockMoves.name: Luck
ClockMoves.description: Your hunter's luck - spend it to change outcomes

advance.name: Use Luck
advance.description: Mark luck when you spend it to change a roll or avoid harm

rollback.name: Restore Luck
rollback.description: Between mysteries, your luck may be restored

ClockMoves.name: Harm
ClockMoves.description: Physical damage taken by the hunter

advance.name: Take Harm
advance.description: Mark harm when you are injured

rollback.name: Heal Harm
rollback.description: First aid heals 1 harm. Proper medical attention heals 2 harm. A full recovery heals all harm.

advance.name: Gain Experience
advance.description: Mark experience when you fail a roll or complete a mystery

rollback.name: Spend Experience
rollback.description: When you fill the experience track, take an advancement and reset
